title: is this the profile of a scripter?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/AdNp2i2.png

this guy, while playing against him, dodged everything i sent against him in an inhuman fashion. normally I'd just consider him very good but he dodged all my karthus skillshots mid teamfight

yeah, I know i suck, but I don't think its humanly possible to not miss an ult shot on xerath even once, especially after flashing
or never miss a q unless you flash
or never get hit by a single skillshot unless you manage to slow them

also, his recent winrate has shot up to a stupid amount. its suspicious to me, I'm looking for people who may or may not agree
